EmailTemplate.subject: Join the Resistance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It is time.
Today, used aerospace parts are not purchased online.
You have to email. Or call. Or know a friend of a friend to find a part for you.
Join the resistance and stop doing things the hard way.
The days of emails and phone calls to purchase parts will soon be long gone. Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect Trade first. Not only does it give you price, product images and quality paperwork but you can checkout in less than sixty seconds.
Our marketplace has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor”. Buy your parts online and you will never want to do it “the old way” ever again.
#NoExcuses SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Fist Bump,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> (powered by Honeywell)
